attributes.action: Recognise poverty in the North West and support families in need
attributes.additional_details: I work in education, and have worked in many areas of severe poverty in the North West.  The poverty for many families has gone on too long.  I need to do something about this!  Sign if you want to help.
attributes.background: As a resident of the Lancaster Morecambe area in the North West, it has come to my attention, nearing Christmas especially, how so many families right on our doorsteps cannot afford the basic needs such as breakfast or decent clothing, even if they are working.  Something needs to be done to help!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to support people in poverty in the North West.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
